942220.name: Ambulance Simulator
942220.description:
Become a symbol of hope to the sick and wounded in Ambulance Simulator!

Feel the adrenaline pumping through your veins as you rush to save victims of a massive car accident. Deliver pre-hospital care and make split-second life or death decisions. Your actions can save lives!

Perform the duties of a paramedic! Answer calls and help patients in all sorts of conditions. Bandage stab wounds, give epinephrine injections, perform CPR, and carry out many more actions to save those in need. Act fast, for there are always more people to attend to. And when the wounded are numerous and you can't save everyone - use the triage system and call for reinforcements!

Explore the town you are assigned to. Use your siren to get through heavy traffic and figure out ways to quickly reach your destination. Upgrade your ambulance to service a bigger area. And if someone doesn't let you drive past, there's always a park you could move through. Just make sure you don't hit any of the pedestrians - you are meant to help people, not hurt them by driving carelessly.

Use grants to finance realistic, advanced equipment for your ambulance. Organize your gear for ease of access. Disinfect used tools and replace dirty gloves. Build up your reputation in the career mode with every life saved. Learn real bandage techniques and medical procedures in an extensive tutorial.

Features:

  • Realistic wound and care system
  • Dynamic open world with integrated traffic and pedestrians
  • A large variety of different assignments based on true stories
  • Career mode
  • Medical gear based on real-life paramedic equipment
  • Reputation system
  • An upgradable ambulance
  • Extensive tutorial teaching about pre-hospital care
  • Unlimited fun!
942220.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 波兰语, 俄语, 简体中文
*具有完全音频支持的语言
